note.p: Gardener. Employed by William Borrer in Henfield, Sussex, 1861. In Henfield, 1841, 1851; at Reigate, Surrey, 1871; at Bletchingley, Surrey, 1881.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1098/9/33/26), 1851 (HO107/1647/494/30), 1861 RG9/606/114/24), 1871 (RG10/830/58/10), 1881 (RG11/803/18/30)
